Quests.Name: go_to_island
Quests.Title: Go To The Mysterious Island
Quests.Description: You received an anonymous letter in the mail telling you to go to an island.
Quests.Objective: Take the boat to go to the island.

Quests.Name: talk_to_sten
Quests.Title: Talk to the Owner
Quests.Description: Now that you have arrived on the mystery island, you should probably find whoever owns this place.
Quests.Objective: Talk to the owner of the island

Quests.Name: sten_slimes
Quests.Title: Get soapstone
Kill Slimes In Sten's House
Quests.Description: Sten wants you to kill the slimes in his house in order to rescue his mods drive.
Quests.ReactionText: Hey! This has some scratches on it! Why don’t you complete some more errands for me and I’ll think about whether I feel like telling you where the item is then.

Quests.Name: sten_amethyst
Quests.Title: Bring Sten an Amethyst
Quests.Objective: Sten wants an amethyst, bring him one.
Quests.ReactionText: Hmmm... This shit SUCKS!$2 Why the fuck does Abigail eat these?! I wanted to know why she likes eating them so much, but I regret even asking for this. I’d say thanks, but I think I just broke my tooth. Well I don’t feel particularly happy, which doesn’t bode well for you. I’m feeling kind though,  so I’ll let you make it up to me by giving you another quest.

Quests.Name: sten_fiber
Quests.Title: Bring Sten Some Fiber
Quests.ReactionText: Wait, did you actually bring me fiber? You know when I said I wanted 'fiber' I obviously meant I wanted you to bring me weed, not weeds you found in your backyard! I thought the air quotations gave it away.

OfferDetails.Text: Hello @.^I heard some rumors that there is an interesting item on a mysterious island nearby. I’ve arranged transportation for you on the beach. I would’ve gone to get the item myself, but I heard that there is a scary man that lives on the island.^  -Anonymous

OfferDetails.DialogueText: First task I want you to do is to save my precious Skyrim mods drive from the slimes in my house. Don't look at me like that. I know what you're thinking.
Now for the second task. Well...I want one amethyst. No, I’m not joking. Just bring it to me.
Oh you’re here. I need you to get me some... 'fiber'. Yeah let’s go with that. 10 fiber.
